entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
